Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for money”
Reviews.Author: Bianca M Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: ideal visiting vatican walking distance 5min walk metro station faced main road busy bit noisy night walking day slept log anyway noise didnt bother friendly staff

Reviews.Title: “Tremendous inn, right in the thick of things, and steps from the Vatican!”
Reviews.Author: fightingwithavim
Reviews.Content: arriving rome study abroad program stay night prior accommodations becoming available researched options tripadvisor close vatican st peters square priority mine 207 inn extremely comfortable offered base operations day city view busy street below helpful staff tasty breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Near Vatican”
Reviews.Author: Ankaja
Reviews.Content: base exploring vatican rome near ottaviano station line hotel located 2nd floor typical roman building elevator time romantic renovated dirty walls tv set repaired breakfast served juice croissant tea coffee perfectly acceptable decent start day

Reviews.Title: “B&B not far from the Vatican!!”
Reviews.Author: albyIMF
Reviews.Content: stayed 207 comfort inn bb week october 2011 bb located viale giulio cesare it’s vatican 10 minutes foot bb 50 metres near underground station … underground downtown bb front desk 24 hours arrive late evening it’s call bb floor normal building inside it’s modern normal bathroom useful located viale giulio cesare busy street it’s sleep window closed breakfast served waitress time defined front desk staff it’s poor breakfast it’s true lot bb poor breakfast improve service effort suggest 207 comfort inn bb don’t luxurious service quality price ratio

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel with a wonderful location with very friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: knoxy777
Reviews.Content: stayed girlfriend september 2010 decided opt balcony told tiny bed surprised normal size bed spending day sight seeing didnt mind balcony hotel clean probably cleanest stayed staff extemely helpful friendlywe didnt language english seved breakfast bed day choice times delivered plenty inexpensive restaurants doorstep cheap market front hotel warm stayed 27 degrees day air conditioning ottaviano metro stop vatican literally stones throw excellent location sightseeing time definitely

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Not Recommend !!!! Must Avoid...”
Reviews.Author: skyrocket747
Reviews.Content: avoid warning experience booking hotel month found arrival hotel gone due booking absolutely unacceptable reason poor management supposed informed days ago reorganize hotel booking dont stay hotel finally hotel reception carring 40 heavy weight bags via journey luckily arrived 45 pm rearrange accommodation arrive late night absolutely nightmare im warning hotel risky yourself sleep

Reviews.Title: “Expectations”
Reviews.Author: julesrollo
Reviews.Content: expectations hubby stayed 207 3 nights meditteranean cruise 2 couples granted tiny comparison found quaint wonderful balcony drink watch romans play clean close vatican walking distance bus colloseum didnt notice noise anyway wouldnt serenaded local market stall owner sitting balcony vino larger available balcony pardon pun price pay able night morning time watch tv rome breakfast locals coffee pastry standing little shop doors hotel owner accomodating lack italian try regard front desk language barrier try thier polite little reserved found nearly italy visited wonderful people willing help tried speak litte language husband fond saying experience definitely recommend hotel expectations realistic
